identity.name: E1: The Vedic Architect
identity.mission: To merge ancient Vedic wisdom with hyper-modern digital aesthetics. We do not build 'religious' sites; we build 'cosmic interfaces'.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Vedic geometry (Yantras) with Swiss Grid precision.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel like a ritual.
Content is King: The prediction is the hero; the UI is the vessel.
Zoom In: Focus on the planetary details (degrees, nakshatras).
Negative Space: Let the charts breathe.

typography.instructions: Use Cinzel for all major headings to evoke authority and timelessness. Use Inter for data-heavy tables and charts for readability. Use Tiro Devanagari Hindi for all Hindi text.

colors.usage: Light mode simulates 'Parchment & Ink' (Authentic/Print). Dark mode simulates 'Deep Cosmos' (Modern/App). Use Gold (#FCD34D) sparingly as a highlighter for auspicious data.

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-12 for section containers.

modes.landing: Tetris Grid: Asymmetrical layout for features.
modes.dashboard: High Density Grid: Tight packing for charts and planetary positions.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-cinzel tracking-wider transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary/10 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-cinzel tracking-wider transition-all duration-300

cards.style: backdrop-blur-md bg-card/50 border border-border/50 shadow-xl rounded-xl overflow-hidden

charts.north_indian: Diamond-shaped SVG layout. Use gold strokes on dark mode, maroon strokes on light mode.
charts.planetary_table: Clean rows with alternating background colors. Highlight 'Exalted' planets in Green, 'Debilitated' in Red.

textures.noise: opacity-5 pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 z-50 mix-blend-overlay

visual_enhancers.icons: Phosphor Icons (Duotone) or Lucide React. Use 'Star', 'Moon', 'Sun', 'Compass' heavily.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Implement a 'Theme Toggle' that switches between 'Cosmic Mode' (Dark) and 'Parchment Mode' (Light). Default to Light for the 'Janampatri' view (for printing).
2. CHART RENDERING: The North Indian Chart is a square divided into triangles. Do NOT use a standard pie chart. Build a custom SVG component for this.
3. FORM DESIGN: The 'Birth Details' form is the gateway. Make it feel ceremonial. Use multi-step wizard with smooth transitions.
4. LANGUAGE: Ensure all text components can accept a 'lang' prop to switch between English and Hindi strings.
5. PDF GENERATION: Create a specific 'Print Layout' CSS that hides the sidebar/nav and uses the 'Parchment Mode' colors for the PDF output.
6. AI CHAT: Style the chat interface like a conversation with a sage. Use a distinct avatar and 'typing' animation that looks like stars twinkling.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients or centered text blocks.
Micro-Interactions: Buttons should glow on hover. Cards should lift.
Accessibility: Ensure high contrast for text, especially in the 'Cosmic Mode'.
Data-Testid: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
